channel.description: Recent content on Mark's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: January 20, 2026 Today's Verse Proverbs 16:19 [19] It is better to be of a lowly spirit with the poor than to divide the spoil with the proud. Today's Memory Verse Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable. Today's Westminster Catechism Q/A 20 - Did God leave all mankind to perish in the estate of sin and misery?
